column1: Kata Robata////I must say this place is fancy
column3: bathrooms have the Japanese toilets which is an experience LOL!but getting into the food
column5: Kobe beef skewers wide selection of sushi (I will highly recommend yellow tail and Toro.)
column6: great rolls as Texas Hamachi and the ocean picante. This is hands down top rated sushi restaurant in Houston in my book :)
